Part 1: 20/10. Good Art, good story. 
Part 2: 8/10. Good Art again, but the story Just went down really Bad. 
Part 3: 5/10. Art went down a Lot in quality compared to the other two. Story went even worse than part 2, doesnt make any sensei. The Art still better than the most of Doujins Out there but not so good to overshadow the trash history this part has. 
Overall 7/10, would fap again to part 1 & 2 but dont Even gonna read again part 3.

I cant find anything definitive on twitter but from what I can tell the writer of the plot is Aomizuan while different artists draw the doujin, part 1 and 2 being by Katsurai Yoshiaki while Part 3 was drawn by Aki Sasada. So people below are bitching about nothing.

Anyways arts still fire, surprised the new author managed to copy the old artstyle well. As for the plot, inclusion of a boyfriend is contrived and useless, I like NTR but that was dumb. Ending is nice, the teacher is chad enough to marry her unlike most doujins.
did Yoshiaki sensei change names? its now Aki Sasada

Yeah this one sucks compared to 1 and 2. Shittier art, boyfriend who comes out of nowhere just to add NTR. Her personality completely changed and she’s now acting like a porn actress. The allure of part 1 and 2 came from her innocent and sweet personality along with the god-level art. Both are missing here. This one is trash and this artist doesn’t do justice to the other person who drew the first two parts.

@fuckthemvanillafags Lol I have nothing against NTR but inserting NTR just for NTR sake is just stupid. I mean theres no mention from what I know in ch 1-2 of a bf and then all of a sudden in this one she's going on a date with her bf but then the teacher calls her to rape her at the table behind her bf. It makes no sense to add this outside of just going oh NTR would be a nice addition to make this more popular or something. Also I never said I didn't like this one just the story/plot makes no sense all of a sudden which makes it worse then it could have been.

Then tells him something like I'm sorry but the bad guy made me pregnant so I can't be with you anymore. Then it ends with her marrying the teacher and them having 5 children together.
